thread.title: Dorchester Collection's Christmas ice rink returns to Hotel Plaza Athénee
thread.title_full: Dorchester Collection's Christmas ice rink returns to Hotel Plaza Athénee

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Dorchester Collection's Christmas ice rink returns to Hotel Plaza Athénee
text:
Dorchester Collection's Christmas ice rink returns to Hotel Plaza Athénee Dorchester Collection's Christmas ice rink returns to Hotel Plaza Athénee Details Category: 2015 Christmas Venues & Packages near you!   15:15 To celebrate the approaching festive season, Hotel Plaza Athénee’s seasonal ice rink is returning to the beautiful setting of La Cour du Jardin, located in the centre of the hotel. Open from Wednesdays to Sundays between 3pm and 7pm, children can enjoy this yuletide feature under the supervision of an instructor who is also available for tuition. 
Friends and family are then free to enjoy the delights of head pastry Chef Christophe Michalak’s afternoon tea in La Galerie, accompanied with a glass of champagne. The ice rink is open from 1 December until 30 January 2016. Related articles
